value: Guidelines for students who wish to go to Vipassana Manthan

You can go for Vipassana only certain designated centres that are in proximity to your respective campuses- For Bangalore, Bangalore Centre and Tiruvannamalai Centre- For Dharamsala, Rohtak Centre and Hoshiarpur Centre
Vipassana should be booked at least 30 days in advance of the program commencement date
